name: Project: NEO
description:
Project: NEO is a sci-fi action roguelike game. You play as a newly-hired ‘Planet Adventurer’, whose job is to set out and explore the exciting yet dangerous areas beyond the city. You will fight many hostile creatures as you navigate the three distinct regions surrounding the city. Gather ore and gain coins to spend on upgrades when you return home. While you're there, chat with the local inhabitants and get to know them. This is Project: NEO. (and did we mention, it’s completely free to play!)

Features

- An immersive world
- 5 different environments
- Randomly generated map layouts
- Gather resources
- Upgrade gear
- A local community you can interact with
- And so much more!

Developer Notes

Project: NEO was created by a small team of passionate developers over the course of a few months. Considering it's the first game we have created on our own, we are proud and confident in how our project turned out. However, we are also aware that the game is not perfect, but as we worked through it we treated it as a learning experience to grow our skills so that we can create games that provide the exact experience a gamer wants in their game. We hope you enjoyed this little project we put together. -Project: NEO Team
